string.name: STR_BM_MSG_TEST
string.body: [%username] is currently playing on a trial account and can wear this item only after converting over to a subscription. To convert your account, please visit [%shoplink].

string.name: STR_BM_MSG_EQUIP_ITEM_RESTRICT_01
string.body: [%username] is currently playing on a trial account and can wear this item only after converting over to a subscription. To convert your account, please visit [%shoplink].

string.name: STR_MSG_F2P_GET_EXP_BOOST_VITAL_BONUS
string.body: You have gained %num1 XP from %0 (Strong Energy of Repose %num2).

string.name: STR_MSG_F2P_GET_EXP_BOOST_VITAL_MAKEUP_BONUS
string.body: You have gained %num1 XP from %0 (Strong Energy of Repose %num2, Energy of Salvation %num3).

string.name: STR_MSG_F2P_COMBAT_MU_EXP_GAIN_BOOST_VITAL_BONUS
string.body: You have gained %0 (Strong Energy of Repose %num1).

string.name: STR_MSG_F2P_COMBAT_MU_EXP_GAIN_BOOST_VITAL_MAKEUP_BONUS
string.body: You have gained %0 (Strong Energy of Repose %num1, Energy of Salvation %num2).

string.name: STR_MSG_F2P_GET_EXP2_BOOST_VITAL_BONUS
string.body: You have gained %num0 XP (Strong Energy of Repose %num1).

string.name: STR_MSG_F2P_GET_EXP2_BOOST_VITAL_MAKEUP_BONUS
string.body: You have gained %num0 XP (Strong Energy of Repose %num1, Energy of Salvation %num2).

string.name: STR_MSG_F2P_EQUIP_ITEM_RESTRICT
string.body: You are currently playing on a trial account and can wear this item only when you convert to subscription. To convert your account, please visit [%shoplink].

string.name: STR_MSG_F2P_COMBINE_ITEM_RESTRICT
string.body: You are a [%bm_account_type] and cannot craft any more items. To remove this restriction, please visit the [%shoplink].

string.name: STR_MSG_F2P_ITEM_DECOMPOSE_DAY_RESTRICT
string.body: You are a [%bm_account_type] and can extract a maximum of %num0 items per week. To remove this restriction, please visit the [%shoplink].

string.name: STR_MSG_F2P_GATHER_DAY_RESTRICT
string.body: You are a [%bm_account_type] and can extract a maximum of %num0 items per week. To remove this restriction, please visit the [%shoplink].

string.name: STR_MSG_F2P_GATHER_SKILL_LEVEL_RESTRICT
string.body: You are a [%bm_account_type] and can only extract from items that require an Essencetapping skill lower than %0 points. To remove this restriction, please visit the [%shoplink].

string.name: STR_MSG_F2P_EXTRACT_GATHER_DAY_RESTRICT
string.body: You are a [%bm_account_type] and can extract a maximum of %num0 items per week. To remove this restriction, please visit the [%shoplink].

string.name: STR_MSG_F2P_EXTRACT_GATHER_SKILL_LEVEL_RESTRICT
string.body: You are a [%bm_account_type] and can only extract from items that require an Aethertapping skill lower than %0 points. To remove this restriction, please visit the [%shoplink].

string.name: STR_MSG_F2P_SELLGOLD_DAY_RESTRICT
string.body: The item sale is not possible because the amount that can be obtained through item sales was exceeded. [%bm_account_type] can sell items up to %0 Kinah per week.[%shoplink]

string.name: STR_MSG_F2P_VENDOR_SELL_RESTRICT
string.body: You are currently playing on a trial account and have reached your maximum daily use of the Sales Agency Window. To sell more items, please convert your account by visiting [%shoplink].

string.name: STR_MSG_F2P_VENDOR_BUY_RESTRICT
string.body: You are currently playing on a trial account and have reached your maximum daily use of the Sales Agency Window. To sell more items, please convert your account by visiting [%shoplink].

string.name: STR_MSG_F2P_LEVEL_UP_RESTRICT
string.body: You are a [%bm_account_type] and cannot level up beyond level %0. To remove this restriction, please visit the [%shoplink].

string.name: STR_MSG_F2P_GUILD_CREATE_RESTRICT
string.body: You are a [%bm_account_type] and cannot create a legion. To remove this restriction, please visit the [%shoplink].

string.name: STR_MSG_F2P_GUILD_WAREHOUSE_USE_RESTRICT
string.body: You are currently playing on a trial account and can access a Legion Warehouse only when you convert to a subscription. To convert your account, please visit [%shoplink].

string.name: STR_MSG_F2P_EXCHANGE_RESTRICT
string.body: You are currently playing on a trial account and can trade with others only when you convert to subscription. To convert your account, please visit [%shoplink].

string.name: STR_MSG_F2P_EXCHANGE_KINA_RESTRICT
string.body: You are currently playing on a trial account and can trade Kinah with others only when you convert to subscription. To convert your account, please visit [%shoplink].

string.name: STR_MSG_F2P_EXCHANGE_ITEM_RESTRICT
string.body: You are currently playing on a trial account and can trade with others only when you convert to subscription. To convert your account, please visit [%shoplink].

string.name: STR_MSG_F2P_PERSONAL_SHOP_OPEN_RESTRICT
string.body: You are currently playing on a trial account and cannot open a private store. To open your own store, please convert your account by visiting [%shoplink].

string.name: STR_MSG_F2P_PERSONAL_SHOP_BUY_RESTRICT
string.body: You are currently playing on a trial account and cannot access private stores. To use private stores, please convert your account by visiting [%shoplink].

string.name: STR_MSG_F2P_MAIL_WRITE_RESTRICT
string.body: You are a [%bm_account_type] and cannot attach items or Kinah to a letter. To remove this restriction, please visit the [%shoplink].

string.name: STR_MSG_F2P_MAIL_WRITE_WITH_ITEM_RESTRICT
string.body: You are a [%bm_account_type] and cannot attach items or Kinah to a letter. To remove this restriction, please visit the [%shoplink].

string.name: STR_MSG_F2P_MAIL_WRITE_ONLY_TO_FRIENDS
string.body: You are a [%bm_account_type] and can send messages only to your friends. To remove this restriction, please visit the [%shoplink].

string.name: STR_MSG_F2P_CHAT_RESTRICT
string.body: You are currently playing on a trial account and can join in the channel chatting only when you convert to subscription. To convert your account, please visit [%shoplink].

string.name: STR_MSG_F2P_SHOUT_RESTRICT
string.body: Characters under level 20 cannot shout to others.

string.name: STR_MSG_F2P_WHISPER_RESTRICT
string.body: Characters under level 10 cannot whisper to others.

string.name: STR_MSG_F2P_WHISPER_EXCEPT_FRIENDS_RESTRICT
string.body: You are a [%bm_account_type] and can only whisper to your friends until you reach level %0. To remove this restriction, please visit the [%shoplink].

string.name: STR_MSG_F2P_CHANNEL_CHAT_RESTRICT
string.body: You are currently playing on a trial account and can join in the channel chatting only when you convert to subscription. To convert your account, please visit [%shoplink].

string.name: STR_MSG_F2P_VENDOR_VENDOR_USE_RESTRICT
string.body: You are a [%bm_account_type] and cannot use the Trade Broker. To remove this restriction, please visit the [%shoplink].

string.name: STR_MSG_F2P_WAREHOUSE_USE_RESTRICT
string.body: You are currently playing on a trial account and can access a Warehouse only when you convert to a subscription. To convert your account, please visit [%shoplink].

string.name: STR_MSG_F2P_CHAR_SLOT_RESTRICT
string.body: You cannot create another character because your account does not have an active Prestige Pass. To purchase a pass, visit the Black Cloud Marketplace.

string.name: STR_MSG_F2P_TRADEGOLD_DAY_RESTRICT
string.body: You are a [%bm_account_type] and cannot trade more than 0% Kinah per week. To remove this restriction, please visit the [%shoplink].

string.name: STR_MSG_F2P_QUEST_ACQUIRE_RESTRICT
string.body: You are a [%bm_account_type] and cannot undertake any more quests. To remove this restriction, please visit the [%shoplink].

string.name: STR_MSG_F2P_PARTY_SEARCH_RESTRICT
string.body: You are a [%bm_account_type] and cannot use the Find Group feature. To remove this restriction, please visit the [%shoplink].

string.name: STR_F2P_MSG_NOTICE_PACK_EXPIRE_TIME
string.body: Your %1 will expire in %DURATIONDAY0.

string.name: STR_F2P_MSG_WARNING_PACK_EXPIRE_TIME
string.body: Your %1 will expire in %DURATIONDAY0. You may be unable to use various other boost effects when this effect expires.

string.name: STR_F2P_MSG_PACK_EXPIRED
string.body: An account boost has expired. Additional Boost items can be found in the shop.

string.name: STR_MSG_F2P_HOUSING_MAINTENANCE_AUCTION_RESTRICT
string.body: You are a [%bm_account_type] and cannot bid on a housing auction. To remove this restriction, please visit the [%shoplink].

string.name: STR_MSG_F2P_HOUSING_MAINTENANCE_PAY_COST_RESTRICT
string.body: You are a [%bm_account_type] and cannot pay housing maintenance. To remove this restriction, please visit the [%shoplink].

string.name: STR_MSG_F2P_HOUSING_OBJECT_PLACE_RESTRICT
string.body: You are a [%bm_account_type] and cannot place %0%, because you have reached your decoration limit. To remove this restriction, please visit the [%shoplink].

string.name: STR_MSG_F2P_COMBINE_MENUISIER_RESTRICT
string.body: You are a [%bm_account_type] and cannot craft any more. To remove this restriction, please visit the [%shoplink].

string.name: STR_MSG_F2P_HOUSING_MAINTENANCE_AUCTION_EXPR_RESTRICT
string.body: You cannot make an auction bid because the remaining time for payment is shorter than the remaining time to the auction deadline. To make a bid at the housing auction freely, please visit the [%shoplink].

string.name: STR_MSG_F2P_INSTANCE_COOLTIME_RESTRICT
string.body: You are a [%bm_account_type], so the cooldown for some instances may be longer. To purchase an item that reduces the cooldown, please visit the [%shoplink].

string.name: STR_MSG_F2P_WOFS_CANT_USE
string.body: You are a [%bm_account_type], so you can only play up to level 46. Please purchase a game pass for unlimited gameplay. Game client will close in 10 minutes.

string.name: STR_MSG_F2P_CHANNEL_CHAT_WRITE_RESTRICT
string.body: Characters under level 10 cannot use channel chat.

string.name: STR_PACK_MILTI_USE_01
string.body: The selected pack application period will be added to your current pack. Do you want to use the selected pack?

string.name: STR_PACK_MILTI_USE_02
string.body: Pack application periods are applied individually, potentially resulting in some limit removals and boost features overlapping. Do you want to use the selected pack?

string.name: STR_MSG_F2P_CANT_USE_LOOT_ACCOUNT
string.body: Since your Party/Alliance contains accounts with the free status, item distribution rules cannot be changed to Instant.

string.name: STR_MSG_F2P_CHANGE_LOOT_ACCOUNT
string.body: The distribution method was changed because there are users with free accounts.

string.name: STR_MSG_F2P_CANT_USE_SPLIT
string.body: Users with free accounts cannot participate in the distribution.

string.name: STR_MSG_F2P_GUILD_WAREHOUSE_DEPOSIT_RESTRICT
string.body: [%bm_account_type] users are not allowed to store items in the Legion Warehouse. To access the Legion Warehouse freely, please buy the items normally.

string.name: STR_MSG_F2P_EXCHANGE_KINA_LEVEL_RESTRICT
string.body: You have a [%bm_account_type] and cannot trade Kinah with others until you reach level %0.

string.name: STR_MSG_F2P_PERSONAL_SHOP_OPEN_LEVEL_RESTRICT
string.body: You have a [%bm_account_type] and cannot open a private store until you reach level %0.

string.name: STR_MSG_F2P_PERSONAL_SHOP_BUY_LEVEL_RESTRICT
string.body: You have a [%bm_account_type] and cannot access private stores until you reach level %0.

string.name: STR_MSG_F2P_VENDOR_SELL_LEVEL_RESTRICT
string.body: You have a [%bm_account_type] and cannot register items in the Sales Agency Window until you reach level %0.

string.name: STR_MSG_F2P_VENDOR_BUY_LEVEL_RESTRICT
string.body: You have a [%bm_account_type] and cannot buy items from the Sales Agency Window until you reach level %0.

string.name: STR_MSG_F2P_CANT_USE_SPLIT_LEVEL_RESTRICT
string.body: You have a [%bm_account_type] and cannot use the distribution feature until you reach level %0.
